content: spring spirals beanie a fun twist to a simple single_crochet beanie… a pattern by tasha wells of cozily covered baby boutique march 2011 materials sizing 5 5 mm crochet hook adult small adult medium ~105-115 yards worsted weight yarn 21-22 22-24 suggested yarn malabrigo rios stitch marker abbreviations tapestry needle chain chain sts stitches gauge slip_stitch slip_stitch 4 sts and 4 row of single_crochet = a little over an inch x single_crochet single_crochet 1 inch blo back loop only change hook size to obtain gauge crown instructions create a magic loop and single_crochet 6 into said loop 6 sts from here on out you will be working in the back loop only also you will be working in continuous rounds do not join feel free to use a stitch marker for easier counting row 1 *2 single_crochet in each stitch repeat from * 12 sts row 2 *1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 18 sts row 3 *2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 24 sts row 4 *3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 30 sts row 5 *4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 36 sts row 6 *5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 42 sts row 7 *6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 48 sts row 8 *7 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 54 sts row 9 *8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 60 sts row 10 *9 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 66 sts row 11 *10 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 72 sts row 12 *11 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 78 sts stop here for the adult small and go to the hat instructions below round 13 *12 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat from * around 84 sts stop here for the adult medium and go to the hat instructions below click here for baby/child size instructions hat instructions at this point you do not need to mark the beginning of the rounds continue to single_crochet in the blo for approximately 4″ 4 25″ this measurement is from the outer edge of the crown once you have reached the measurement listed above you will start the brim of the hat continue in the round with a slip_stitch in the blo for approximately an inch make sure you do not slip_stitch tightly it may help to go up a hook size or two fasten_off and weave in the ends copyright & thanks you may not
